column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered from Door Dash
column2: and there was a glitch somehow
column3: so the restaurant received the order
column4: but didn't process it.  After about 2 1/2 hours
column5: we finally received our pizza.  I contacted the company
column6: and they made it more than right.  We are very pleased with our interactions with this company
column7: and the management.  And the pizza is delicious!
